summary: REQ-10 through REQ-13 appear to be implemented: fetch robustness + cache fallback and recovery UI actions were added, theme toggle and theme persistence were implemented, a settings dialog with multiple local-persisted preferences was added, and the global warm palette was refined for light/dark modes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a Play Store release planning/compliance document
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for release notes or Play Store planning documentation; it only requests theme/settings UI, color styling, and prompt loading fixes.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution changes (caffeine.ai link and heart icon)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request footer content/attribution changes; only theme/settings UI, color palette refinement, and prompt loading fixes.
